title: TERRORISM AND THE MEDIA DISPATCHES FROM THE FRONTLINES
description: A presentation by Iqbal Athas, Consultant Editor – Defence Correspondent at The Sunday Times, Colombo, Sri Lanka, at the 2003 Annual Investigative Reporters and Editors (IRE) Conference in Washington D.C. about the challenges faced by journalists reporting on the conflict in Sri Lanka and the impact of the conflict on the media.
